Piano studio

Posted 10. January 2020. 1 min read.

I give piano lessons and consultations for professionals who need quick or detailed feedback.

There is an possibility to record the lesson in HQ for your future reference. The optional recording is free of charge.

One hour lesson for professionals - $100

For students - $70

The schedule depends on my availability, see my concerts page.

Booking

Please use contact form or @email me to book your time or ask a question.
